thread.section_title: Mazuma Mobile Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mazuma Mobile Australia | mazumamobile.com.au
thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Mazuma Mobile Australia reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: My experience with selling two iPads to Mazuma was excellent in every respect. The web interface was clear and everything happened as it should with getting the packaging speedily and receiving an immediate confirmation of their receipt and payment. When their payment into my account didn't go through (not sure why, but probably my fault), they immediately let me know that they had mailed out a cheque. All communications with them have been so clear and literate and pleasant that I'll definitely use Mazuma again.
